desc: Mailorder and label for the doomed, punked and droned. Owned by one of the founders of Roadburn Festival. Home of the riff records. All in pursuit of heaviness! Based in Amsterdam. Roadburn Records too. #bongripper #theangelicprocess #yob #sleep #fumanchu #subrosa #wolvesinthethroneroom #mizmor #oranssipazuzu

layout.text: Set Chaos To The Heart Of The Moon (Live At Roadburn Redux 202) CD/DVD now available
